ComicInfo.Summary: Andromeda is captured by the FBI while Lucien is still out there weakening to the death under the influence of Grigorieff who hold sway on him by the power of the Dayak pages. In the meantime, Grigorieff is getting way too close of getting his hands on the precious gem he needs to magnify his powers...
